moduleTitle: Module 3.2: TIW Training - Bambu Lab P1P 3D Printing Training

infoSections.text: The **Bambu Lab P1P** is a compact and versatile 3D printer designed for both beginners and experienced users. It features a dual extruder system, enabling the printing of multi-material objects, and boasts high print speed and precision. With a build volume of 256 x 256 x 256 mm, it's suitable for creating a wide range of prototypes and models.

tasks.taskDescription: Complete the "Bambu Lab P1P 3D Printing Training" module on Canvas and send a screenshot of completion in an email to this email address: lhnt.onboarding@gmail.com
